attributes.action: Make MP's work for the minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
All MP's should work for minimum wage, have most benefits cut but be allowed to collect travel, accommodation and other reasonable expenses. Zero tax breaks on 2nd & 3rd homes etc.
This would fill the commons with people WANTING to make a difference and not those just there with their old school tie gang to make a killing at our expense!
Time for these leeches to be removed!!!
